mapper.select: SELECT A.GOOD_ID, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.GOOD_PRODUCT_PRICE, B.PRODUCT_ID, B.PRODUCT_NAME, B.INTRODUCE_PRODUCT_ID, B.INTRODUCE_PRODUCT_NAME, B.INTRODUCE_PRODUCT_TYPE, B.CHARGE_TYPE, B.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM tf_asiainfo_product_good A LEFT JOIN tf_asiainfo_product B ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID WHERE A.GOOD_ID = #{username} AND A.START_DATE <= sysdate AND A.END_DATE >= sysdate AND B.START_DATE <= sysdate AND B.END_DATE >= sysdate
